name: NISTSRM1950_251
query: QUERY scaninfo(MS1DATA) FILTER MS1MZ=251.09579:TOLERANCEPPM=1000 AND RTMIN=12 AND RTMAX=14

name: NISTSRM1950_158
query: QUERY scaninfo(MS1DATA) FILTER MS1MZ=158.93919:TOLERANCEPPM=10 AND RTMIN=12 AND RTMAX=14

name: NISTSRM1950_251_or_158
query: QUERY scaninfo(MS1DATA) FILTER MS1MZ=(251.09579 OR 158.93919):TOLERANCEPPM=12 AND RTMIN=12.0 AND RTMAX=14.0

name: NISTSRM1950_473
